fields.label: Alert Bar
fields.name: alert_bar
fields.instructions:
Sample alerts:
DELAY: Classes on the main Chicopee campus will start at [time] today, [day of week], [month] [date]. Classes on satellite campuses will follow the protocol of their respective sites.
CLOSING EARLY: Elms College will close at [time] today, [day of week], [month] [date], due to inclement weather. For information about satellite campuses, please check their respective websites.
FULL CLOSURE: Elms College will be closed today, [day of week], [month] [date], due to inclement weather. For information about satellite campuses, please check their respective websites.

IMPORTANT NOTE: If you're putting a link in this it has to be proper HTML (a href="" with the proper < or > brackets) and it has to be the full path: https://elms-staging.r6a5yukd-liquidwebsites.com/. This is because this alert gets piped to the commencement subsite and we relative links (/page) will not work.
